name: labana world
short_description:
Feeling bored? Why not plan for the most adventurous and exciting journey to Goa in India. This pretty province of Goa is blessed with quixotic location and is wrapped up with the verdant hills of the Western Ghats along with surging plains, long stretched pristine beaches, ancient monuments and natural springs. 
Get aboard with Goa tour Package to explore this ultimate holiday destination in India, Goa which boasts about its exoticness, the sunny destination with the cool waves of the waters and further taking you to the time, when the sparkling beaches come out as the hub of the party animals. The place for the hedonists will let to party hard, all the night along with letting the foodies to gorge on some of the delectable and lip-smacking cuisines till the time of dawn, letting you to bask under the radiant sun.
Referred to as ‘the Rome of the Orient’ of the past days, Goa has long served as a magnet for serene hedonists.
summary: Goa holiday package will take you to the smallest state of India along
